title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4218.2 - Drug detection facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4218.2 - Drug detection facilities

State Regulations
(a) Each
track operator shall provide such facilities, appurtenances and equipment for
drug detection programs, or other related activities as the commission may
specify. (b) No person shall enter
or be present at any time in any enclosure set aside by direction of the
commission for the taking and examination of samples from horses except the
staff immediately in charge of such work, the commission, its chairman and
members, its staff, the judges, the custodians of the horse, or such other
persons as may be authorized by this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4218.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
